Connections¶

These properties are common to all node drawers. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam cursus sit amet justo nec lacinia. Pellentesque id hendrerit eros. Suspendisse a nunc enim. Quisque vitae velit dolor.

‘curve’ style¶

Properties¶

nodeLineWidthStart¶

Start width of the connection curve

Type
Number
Default
9.8
nodeLineWidthEnd¶

End width of the connection curve

Type
Number
Default
1.4
nodeCx1Factor 0.7¶

Control point 1 X-factor of the connection curve

Type
Number
Default
0.7
nodeCx2Factor¶

Control point 2 X-factor of the connection curve

Type
Number
Default
.28
nodeCy1Factor¶

Control point 1 Y-factor of the connection curve

Type
Number
Default
0.0
nodeCy2Factor¶

Control point 2 Y-factor of the connection curve

Type
Number
Default
0.0

‘junction’ style¶

Properties¶

lineWidth¶

Width of the connection line

Type
Number
Default
4.0
junctionXFactor¶

Horizontal position of the junction sign in relation to the total horizontal width of the connection line

0.0 - at the parent node 0.0-1.0 - between the parent and child nodes 1.0 - at the child node
Type
Number
Default
0.4
cornerStyle¶

Style of the corners of the connection lines.

Type
Enum
Values
square | beveled | rounded
Default
rounded
cornerRadius¶

Radius of the corners of the connection lines (has no effect with the square corner style).

Type
Number
Default
12.0
junctionStyle¶

Style of the junction point.

Type
Enum
Values
none | square | disc | diamond.
Default
disc
junctionRadius¶

Radius of the junction point.

Type
Number
Default
10.0
junctionFillColor¶

Fill color of the junction point.

Type
Color
Default
baseColor
junctionStrokeWidth¶

Stroke width of the junction sign.

Type
Number
Default
2.0
junctionStrokeColor¶

Stroke color of the junction sign.

Type
Color
Default
baseColor
junctionSign¶

Style of the sign inside the junction point.

Type
Enum
Values
none | plus | minus
Default
none
junctionSignSize¶

Size of the junction sign.

Type
Number
Default
10.0
junctionSignStrokeWidth¶

Stroke width of the junction sign.

Type
Number
Default
2.0
junctionSignColor¶

Color of the junction sign.

Type
Color
Default
baseColor.blend(bgColor, .7)
